meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unusual or unexpected.
meanings.sent1: The unwontednesses of the situation left everyone surprised.
meanings.sent2: Her unwontednesses in the quiet town made her stand out.
meanings.sent3: The unwontednesses of a penguin wearing a top hat brought smiles to the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The unwontednesses of a rainbow at midnight seemed like a magical dream.
meanings.sent5: The unwontednesses of a talking dog captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The act of being out of the ordinary or unfamiliar.
meanings.sent1: The unwontednesses of his behavior puzzled his friends.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the unwontednesses of a new city can be exciting.
meanings.sent3: The unwontednesses of a cat walking on two legs amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The unwontednesses of a flower blooming in winter felt like a miracle.
meanings.sent5: The unwontednesses of a snowstorm in July was truly bizarre.
